member.name: T:Net7_Tools.Database.DataValidation
member.summary: Validate a data field
member.remarks: Some validations cannt be added within TableIO's addValidation() such as those that need to query the data of another field or those that need to access a "current" state, such as whether the field is enabled or not or whether the record is in add or edit mode. In those cases the data validation needs to be performed within IRecordManager's validField().

member.name: T:Net7_Tools.Database.DataValidation.Result
member.summary: Result of validations
member.returns: If there's a validation error then the explaination is contained within the message
member.remarks: When m_message contains null then there isn't a validation error. It's only when m_message contains a message that there is an error.

member.name: F:Net7_Tools.FrmItemTree.m_selectedItemId
member.value: The ID of the selected item.

member.name: M:Net7_Tools.FrmItemTree.#ctor

summary.para: Constructor
Automatically call loadData() to initialize the contents of the tree.

member.remarks: This form is shown/hidden rather than created/destroyed in order to retain lists of data. This is faster than querying on demand but takes more memory and increases the chances of working with stale data.

summary.para: Collapse the tree nodes and (if it exists) select the item ID.
Retrieve the item information from the database and display it within the tree, ordered by category, sub category, and item name.
Select the specified item ID if it exists within the tree.

member.name: M:Net7_Tools.FrmItemTree.setSelectedItemId(System.String)

summary.para: Set the selected item ID.

member.remarks: This will be used when the form is shown, to select the item (if it exists) within the tree.

summary.para: Retrieve the selected item ID.
Close the form and update the selected item ID
Close the form.

member.name: T:Net7_Tools.ListViewColumnSorter
member.summary: This class is an implementation of the 'IComparer' interface. http://support.microsoft.com/kb/319401

member.name: F:Net7_Tools.ListViewColumnSorter.ColumnToSort
member.summary: Specifies the column to be sorted

member.name: F:Net7_Tools.ListViewColumnSorter.OrderOfSort
member.summary: Specifies the order in which to sort (i.e. 'Ascending').

member.name: F:Net7_Tools.ListViewColumnSorter.ObjectCompare
member.summary: Case insensitive comparer object

member.name: M:Net7_Tools.ListViewColumnSorter.#ctor
member.summary: Class constructor. Initializes various elements

member.name: M:Net7_Tools.ListViewColumnSorter.Compare(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: This method is inherited from the IComparer interface. It compares the two objects passed using a case insensitive comparison.
member.returns: The result of the comparison. "0" if equal, negative if 'x' is less than 'y' and positive if 'x' is greater than 'y'

member.name: P:Net7_Tools.ListViewColumnSorter.SortColumn
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of the column to which to apply the sorting operation (Defaults to '0').

member.name: P:Net7_Tools.ListViewColumnSorter.Order
member.summary: Gets or sets the order of sorting to apply (for example, 'Ascending' or 'Descending').
